name: Alpha Roach (Scoot-o-Speed-Studios)
description:
Be Cockroach. Leave Wall. Find Bread. 

By Team Scoot-o-Speed-Studios

Controls

WASD to Move

Space to Jump / Advance Dialogue

Hold ‘R’ to Reset to last checkpoint
